name: flashlight
description: It's a red plastic flashlight. You've had it for as long as you can remember.

itemInteractions.Battery: You put the battery into the flashlight. It's still missing one battery.

verbInteractions.Open: You unscrew the cap of the Flashlight. It's missing two batteries.
verbInteractions.Use: You flick the switch on and off, but nothing happens.
verbInteractions.Examine: It's a red plastic flashlight. You've had it for as long as you can remember.
verbInteractions.Take: You grab the flashlight and turn it on. It isn't working.
